data.title: Support for optimising IK solvers. Use minimum of the remaining stage timeout and configured IK solver timeout
Add ability to preempt the task when a stage fails (preempt_on_failure)
Add Enable collisions visualizations (#708) from `master` to `ros2`
Enable use of properties::_class::property for custom python bindings
Fix build issues by replacing fmt::join with rcpputils::join for better cross-platform compatibility
Add wrapper stage to limit the number of solutions returned by the child (#698)
Add wrapper stage to limit the number of solutions returned by the child (#698)
Add functions for adding markers to solutions
Add ability to preempt execution and add test
Fix two nodes launched with same name of /rivz2
Remove clamping of joint constraint in MoveRelative stage
ComputeIK: report failures the modern way
uniform cmake version to the higest used : 3.11
Call reset before initializing the task
Enhancement/use hpp for headers based on PR https://github.com/moveit/moveit2/pull/3113
[wip] Fix duplicate scenes in Solution.msg in forward planning
Add support for GenerateRandomPose python binding
[WIP] Quick access of stages by id/index
Add Task's setRobotModel to python binding
Avoid segfault and improve error warnings
Reduce preempt stop time in stages
MoveRelative: gracefully handle identical min/max distance
Add property to enable/disable pruning at runtime
Set controller names in Demo pick and place task
Fail early when Connect stage start state is in collision
Add ability to move objects from planning scene
Fix description of max_distance property of Connect stage
Set independant start and end states in a Generator stage
Temporarily fix issues with execution of pick+place demo
Correctly handle failures of the pipeline planner
[WIP] Move Relative with Pilz does not reject trajectory with collision
Expose rotation axis to stage property
Distinguish between collision and bound error in JointInterpolationPlanner
Add planner info to MTC solution comment.
avoid mapping memory and comparing joints with zero variables
Update to pipeline planner to moveit2 API changes
Update unittests to breaking moveit2 update
Print warning if no controllers are configured for trajectory execution
Add function to Introspection class to retrieve all solutions
Fix the typo in the execute_task_solution_capability.cpp file in ros2 branch
Update to the more recent JumpThreshold API
fixup! Reset joint values in scene diff for execution (#498)
[DON'T MERGE] Test if #355 causes CI failure
Revert implicit trajectory info property inheritance
Reset joint values in scene diff for execution
Fix assert on multi-init() with Fallback
disable hooks for unused rviz-based task construction
Set non inf default timeout in current state stage
Add planner name to trajectory info
Make move relative stage handle planning failure
Make mtc execute solution capability apply scene diffs
introspection: remove any invalid ROS-name chars from hostname
Patches and fixes for ros2 branch
JointInterpolationPlanner: optional max_effort property to pass along to GripperCommand
Handle failed trajectory in connect stage
remove extra semicolon that triggers compiler warning
Use const reference instead of reference for ros::NodeHandle
MoveRelative: Allow backwards operation for a joint-space delta
Task: findChild() and operator[] should directly operate on stages()
Fix marker creation: allow zero scale for geometric shapes
ComputeIK: Limit collision checking to JMG
remove underscore from public members in MotionPlanResponse
Sync ROS2 branch with the master branch
CostTerms: joint-weighted costs, expose to python
Update the planning scene ACM API
[ros2] Add Pilz industrial motion planner as a solver option for move stages
set useful build-options from MoveIt also in MTC
Printing collision info for invalid IK solutions.
[ros2]: Add moveit cost function for IK solver as parameter for Cartesian path solver
Remove collision objects as final step
Add ability to specify KinematicsQueryOptions for CartesianPath solver
Add test depend for source build
Fix Eigen build issues on some platforms
Add property to make pruning optional
Fix using IKFrame with MoveRelative in ROS2
[ros2] Add Stage property to assign a list of controllers to use when executing the planned trajectory
Pruning: Relax too strong assertion: PRUNED => !ARMED
move constructor deletes implicitly declared copy assignment operator
Add trajectory_parameterization parameter to CartesianPath & JointInterpolationPlanner
execute_task_solution_capability: check for canceling request before canceling the goal handle
MoveRelative: Fix bug in calculation of target pose
Fallbacks reworked: Factorize FallbacksPrivate into 3 separate classes
Add MoveTo tests & make them pass
Improve readability of internal-external bimap using tags
Update main scene node's pose on updates of robot's model frame
switch CI ccov job to Debug build
Set max cartesian end-effector speed in planning pipeline
Implement missing pregrasp property for RobotState.msg
make CI jobs more picky & fix pointed out bugs
Fix some memory issues pointed out by sanitizer
Allow to consider specific joints only in PathLength
run full demo as a test
support modifying wrappers in user stages
prune outside states on failure inside container
prune infeasible partial solutions inside container from the outside
explicitly instantiate template for required values
ROS2: re-enable the singleton of the task panel
documenting instructions for the pick-and-place task
remove roscpp as an export dependency for the core package
demo: Update mtc.rviz to use fixed robot color + alpha
introspection: Fix hostname having  as character
Don't register the first/last subsolutions to the start/end states of SolutionSequence
Task: Add ability to set timeout
Fix pick-place-demo: Correctly set hand group
adapt tests to new moveit_resources layout
Add creator stage name to SolutionInfo
Add ability to add/remove objcets to/from planning scene
add property to maximize clearance during IK stage
Fix for GCC5 (Ubuntu 16.04 / Kinetic) call to non-constexpr function
Make pregrasp pose optional in GenerateGraspPose
build tests using gmock via catkin_add_gmock
add an icon for the RViz interface

added 'PlanningScene' object in rviz by default

Add stage's compute time in seconds

external source needed in moveit-master branch

adding cost calculations to connect and move_to

inf cost states always go last

expose typed setters in Cartesian solver
